text: The 1920–21 Colgate Radiers men's basketball team represented Colgate University during the 1920–21 college men's basketball season. The head coach was William Reid, coaching the Raiders in his second season. The team had finished with an overall record of 16–6. The team captain was Nels Anderson. ==Schedule== |- ==References== Category:Colgate Raiders men's basketball seasons Colgate Colgate Colgate
title: 1920–21 Colgate men's basketball team
